verbs.description: [ARG0: athletics] [V: exercise] [ARG1: 2019 option on rhp fernando rodney] the oakland athletics have exercised right - hander fernando rodney 5 25 million club option for 2019 the a announced the move on wednesday to bring the 41-year - old rodney back for another season rodney was acquired from minnesota on aug 9 for minor league pitcher dakota chalmers rodney went 1 - 1 with a 3 92 era in 22 games for the a after saving 25 games for the twins before the deal rodney has pitched for 10 teams in a 16-year career and ranks 18th with 325 saves option dakota chalmers oakland athletics oakland california fernando rodney oakland
